resources.string:
- Tap once to open.

- Tap twice for details.

- Tap thrice to display information box.

- Tap four times to exit.
You are in Home Screen. Tap once to open. Tap twice for details. Tap thrice to display information box. Tap four times to exit.

- Tap once to enter number.

- Tap twice to call.

- Tap thrice to display information box.

- Tap four times to exit.
You are in Call Screen. Tap once to enter number. Tap twice to call. Tap thrice to display information box. Tap four times to exit.

- Tap once to read message.

- Tap thrice to display information box.

- Tap four times to exit.
You are in Message Screen. Tap once to read message. Tap thrice to display information box. Tap four times to exit.

- Tap once to read.

- Tap twice to speak.

- Tap thrice to display information box.

- Tap four times to exit.
You are in Diary Screen. Tap once to read. Tap twice to speak. Tap thrice to display information box. Tap four times to exit.

- Tap once to read.

- Tap twice to refresh.

- Tap thrice to display information box.

- Tap four times to exit.
You are in Battery Screen. Tap once to read. Tap twice to refresh. Tap thrice to display information box. Tap four times to exit.
